sql.if: and( upper((select stu_name from student st where st.stu_id= d.stu_id)) LIKE upper('%${keyword1}%') or upper(d.dayoff_kind) LIKE upper('%${keyword1}%') or upper(d.payment_status) LIKE upper('%${keyword1}%') )

mapper.select: select to_char(d.APPLICATION_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI') "application_date" ,to_char(d.DAYOFF_START,'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI') "dayoff_start" ,to_char(d.DAYOFF_END,'YYYY-MM-DD AM HH:MI') "dayoff_end" ,d.DAYOFF_KIND "dayoff_kind" ,d.stu_id "stu_id" ,(select stu_name from student st where st.stu_id= d.stu_id) "stu_name" ,d.PAYMENT_STATUS "payment_status" ,d.etc "etc" from dayoff d where d.day_id =#{day_id}
select count(*) from dayoff d where 1=1

select to_number(d.day_id) "day_id" ,(select stu_name from student st where st.stu_id= d.stu_id) "stu_name" ,d.stu_id "stu_id" ,(select stu_name from student st where st.stu_id= d.stu_id) "stu_name" ,to_char(d.APPLICATION_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') "application_date" ,to_char(d.DAYOFF_START,'yyyy-mm-dd') "dayoff_start" ,to_char(d.DAYOFF_END,'yyyy-mm-dd') "dayoff_end" ,d.PAYMENT_STATUS "payment_status" ,d.DAYOFF_KIND "dayoff_kind" from dayoff d where 1=1
order by to_number(d.day_id) desc
mapper.insert: insert into dayoff( day_id ,stu_id ,dayoff_start ,dayoff_end ,dayoff_kind ,payment_status ,etc ) values( (select (nvl(max(to_number(day_id)),0)+1) from dayoff) ,#{stu_id} ,TO_DATE(#{dayoff_start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') ,TO_DATE(#{dayoff_end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') ,#{dayoff_kind} ,'미결재' ,#{etc} )
